original_text: For from Israel was it also: the workman made it; therefore it is not God: but the calf of Samaria shall be broken in pieces.
korean_text: 이것은 이스라엘에서 나고 장인이 만든 것이라 참 신이 아니니 사마리아의 송아지가 산산조각이 나리라

sentences.original_text: For from Israel was it also:
but calf of Samaria shall be broken in pieces.
